pkgmetadata.longdescription: Furniture for Applied Quantitative Researchers // Contains two main functions (i.e., two pieces of furniture): table1() which produces a well-formatted table of descriptives common as Table 1 in research articles and washer() which is helpful in cleaning up your data. In addition, tableM() provides a descriptive table to understand patterns of missing values in the stratifying variable. These furniture functions are designed to simplify common tasks in quantitative analysis.
